page.title: 19Rose and Crown,Nympsfield.
page.content: The Rose and Crown was established as a{coaching inn}_records date back to 1685.There have been a few changes made by the present owners who have been here for 2.5 years.They have added a few flower tubs and window- boxes and also a children's play area. There are two public bars and seven bedrooms,two of which are used for {bed and breakfast}guests.People come from as far away as{America}and{West} {Germany}as well as from all over England.Home-cooked food is served.On warm evenings, food is also cooked outside on a recently built barbecue. Children are allowed to eat inside the pub if accompanied.In{Summer}they can have as many as{1,000}customers in a week and in{Winter}less than{300.}It's open daily for 8hrs. and 5 on Sundays. The{beer}which they sell comes from Cheltenham and costs from{69_84p a pt.
